exercises.name: DB Romanian Deadlifts
exercises.desc: Hinge at hips, dumbbells close to legs. Engage hamstrings and glutes.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.desc: Squeeze glutes at top. Optionally elevate feet on bench.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Rows
exercises.desc: Row dumbbells to ribs, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.desc: Palms face each other. Controlled up and down.

exercises.name: Reverse Lunges
exercises.desc: Step backward, front shin vertical. Push to stand.

exercises.name: DB Overhead Press
exercises.desc: Press overhead. Engage core, avoid arching.

exercises.name: Rear Delt Raises
exercises.desc: Hinge forward, lift dumbbells out and slightly back.

exercises.name: Prone T-Y-I Raises
exercises.desc: Raise arms into T, Y, I from prone position.
